inclusion.criterion: Newly diagnosed with T2D within 4 years
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Subject may be on up to 2 medications for diabetes.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Smart phone or home computer compatible with DEXCOM CLARITY software
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Assessed by endocrinologist and diabetes educator to be able to perform skills necessary for CGM use and insulin delivery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Newly diagnosed with T2D within 4 years
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Autoimmune Type 1 DM, defined as positive GAD65 or islet cell antibodies
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD) Stage IV or greater
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Mental and/or cognitive disorder (based on documented disorder and/or assessment of physician or educator)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: No access to computer for downloading CGM
exclusion.label: met

notes: The patient has type 1 diabetes confirmed with molecular analysis and is being treated for cardiomyopathy.
